name: Veil of Shooting Stars (Lite)
description:
Warning: This tool is NOT Mobile or IPad friendly.

Veil of Shooting Stars can be used as a tabletop RPG Storyteller's aid (especially for World of Darkness / Chronicles of Darkness campaigns) to generate a story.

This uses the Agrippa's Celestial Alphabet system of 22 Glyphs, with corresponding meanings i've put together from the Hebrew/Ugaritic letters they were based on. This can also be used as a Tarot Divination Tool (or auxillary) with 22 animated and illustrated Glyph Cards.

This  Lite Version is the same as the Standard Version except it is not downloadable, have no Save/Load Reading Feature and cannot do Screenshots.

Purchase the Standard Version here: https://audze.itch.io/voss
